entry.title: Crispy leaves & fresh air- the definition of autumnal walks in Ballyhoura ğŸ Take some time out to enjoy the spectacular views from the Attychran Loop into the Galtee Mountains. The low difficulty level of this walk and the car parking, toilets and small s
entry.content: Crispy leaves & fresh air- the definition of autumnal walks in Ballyhoura ğŸ Take some time out to enjoy the spectacular views from the Attychran Loop into the Galtee Mountains. The low difficulty level of this walk and the car parking, toilets and small shop at the trailhead make it an excellent choice for families. #VisitBallyhoura #DiscoverIreland #AutumnTrails #Keepdiscovering #Ireland2040 #IrelandsHiddenHeartlands #Ballyhoura #OurRuralIreland #Ballyhouratrails

entry.content: ğŸ¥¾Bernard Loop is a fantastic route. The initial climb on the trail uphill is steep but itâ€™s a good warm-up. The route is a nice mixture of covered and open forest paths, gravel roads and grassy hills. The scenery is great, plenty of wildlife to see, look out for the deer near the stream #VisitBallyhoura #DiscoverIreland #Keepdiscovering #Ireland2040 #IrelandsHiddenHeartlands #Ballyhoura #OurRuralIreland

entry.content: "ğ‘¨ğ’ğ’… ğ’‚ğ’• ğ’•ğ’‰ğ’† ğ’†ğ’ğ’… ğ’ğ’‡ ğ’•ğ’‰ğ’† ğ’…ğ’‚ğ’š, ğ’šğ’ğ’–ğ’“ ğ’‡ğ’†ğ’†ğ’• ğ’”ğ’‰ğ’ğ’–ğ’ğ’… ğ’ƒğ’† ğ’…ğ’Šğ’“ğ’•ğ’š, ğ’šğ’ğ’–ğ’“ ğ’‰ğ’‚ğ’Šğ’“ ğ’ğ’†ğ’”ğ’”ğ’š, ğ’‚ğ’ğ’… ğ’šğ’ğ’–ğ’“ ğ’†ğ’šğ’†ğ’” ğ’”ğ’‘ğ’‚ğ’“ğ’Œğ’ğ’Šğ’ğ’ˆ." Come and explore your next adventure at the Ballyhoura Mountain Bike Trails ğŸš´ nestled in the beautiful Ballyhoura mountains â›°. Immerse yourself deep in the lush forest alive with native wildlife. 98km of flowy trails including forest road climbs, tight twisty singletrack with a rollercoaster of ups and downs and a boardwalk is guaranteed to leave you smiling. The trails range from the moderate 6km Greenwood loop to the demanding Castlepook loop, over 50km in length! Take on the trails at a speed suited to your current skillset. Park your car, rent a bike from @ballyhouratrailriders and off you go! After your adrenaline-fueled adventure, you can sate your appetite at the nearby @spruce_and_willow CafÃ© in Ardpatrick. #VisitBallyhoura #DiscoverIreland #IrelandsHiddenHeartlands #AdventureIsland #keepdiscovering #adventuretourism #loveireland #mtb #mtblife #mtbtrails
